description: The youngest of King Triton's daughters, Ariel is a beautiful and spirited young mermaid with a thirst for adventure. Longing to find out more about the world beyond the sea, Ariel visits the surface and falls for the dashing Prince Eric. Following her heart, she makes a deal with the evil sea witch, Ursula, to experience life on land.
A family trip to Mexico turns into a nightmare when they encounter a massive shark near an abandoned oil rig.
A soldier returns to Afghanistan to rescue the interpreter who saved his life during the war.
A family uncovers a long-buried secret in a coastal property, unleashing an ancient creature.
After a crash landing on an unknown planet, a pilot discovers he's not alone â€” dinosaurs roam the land.
